website_summaries.verdict: Though some coins may end up lost in the legs, if you want a piggy bank that earns praise for its durability and cuteness, it's worth considering.
pros: This soft yet sturdy vinyl piggy bank offers a fun alternative to classic, hard plastic or ceramic models
Sports a cute facial expression with a moveable head, and comes with a gingham scarf
cons: Coins tend to get stuck in the legs, and they are somewhat difficult to get out of the opening

customer_reviews.title: Some Pig!
customer_reviews.text: This is the piggy bank every child should own! I want to buy my other two kids one now! Sturdy, won't break, the plug at bottom is a turn style lock so kids can't easily remove, the head removes if you want to put larger coins such as half dollars in. My daughter has named him Wilbur and sleeps with the little guy. She won't let me recycle the box he came in because even it is adorable. It looks like a barn and a stall for him. Great gift and great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cinderkelly

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect, I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Exactly what I was looking for! I love that it's rubber and not ceramic so my 2 year old can't smash it if she throws it (which she probably will). It's the size it says in the description and it's adorably cute! Bought 2, one for both of my daughter's. My husband is so excited about them he wanted to wake up our kids just to give them to them. But I convinced him he could wait to see their excitement till morning. I stenciled their names onto them with permanent marker (we'll see how long it'll last). Can't say enough good things about these cute piggies!
customer_reviews.author: Collette Kibler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I had to order a piggy bank quickly because my daughter's plastic one fell and broke. She really wanted a "pig" piggy bank so after reading these reviews I decided to try this one. She adores it and we turned the scarf into a bonnet so it's easier for my daughter to put the coins in. My daughter happily said "she looks like Red Riding Hood!" I'm surprised at how sturdy this piggy bank feels too! I expected more of a "squishy" rubber but it's hard enough that it feels like a toddler toy! I got this today so I'm not sure how long it will last, but I have a great feeling about it!
customer_reviews.author: A. Lohrum

customer_reviews.title: Looks used.
customer_reviews.text: It came missing pieces and with scuffs all over it.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly Carver

customer_reviews.title: This little piggy is perfect for 2 y o grandson
customer_reviews.text: This rubber piggy bank is the right size for my two year old grandson. It is light weight and of course dont have to worry about it smashing. He has a blue scarf, its head rotates and he is light weight, so my baby boy can carry it. He and I have a game. When I visit or he visits, I make sure I give him pennies, change for his bank. He has so much fun sizing the coins to the opening. Piggy has a boy's name and when I ask where he is, my grandson knows exactly. This is out teaching moment.
customer_reviews.author: M Brady

customer_reviews.title: NOT RUBBER
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but this is NOT RUBBER. It is a very hard thick plastic. Bought this for my 18 month old bc she likes to play with her piggies and I wanted a soft, unbreakable one. If that is what ur looking for, this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Long-Lasting, Great Piggy Bank
customer_reviews.text: Well this piggy bank was bigger than I imagined which is even better because I got what I paid for. It was worth every penny (no pun intended), all the pieces were there, it shipped fast, and overall I just have no complaints. I will definitely have this for years to come lol. It's so cute too. Update: I still have it and it's 2020. It's in perfect condition. It's also nowhere near full but that's on me lol.
customer_reviews.author: Nisha

customer_reviews.title: How hard is it to get a Piggy bank with a plug?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my grand daughters birthday in Georgia. It arrived without a plug. We did a return, they shipped it over night, new one...NO PLUG. Returning it again, getting new one tomorrow, wonder if it will have a plug? Without a plug, not a bank, just an expensive rubber pig.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: and this little piggy
customer_reviews.text: Ceramic piggy's don't last long around 3 yr old's. This rubber one will work just fine. She's getting it for Christmas along with the little book The Original Story of the Piggy Bank. I know she will love it. The little piggy is so cute but even when she carries it around like she did her other one, it won't break. Big enough to hold a lot of coins. The slit is big enough to put a couple of coins in at once. The stopper opens and closes easily. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dosie

customer_reviews.title: Pleased Saver
customer_reviews.text: We have started the process of teaching our 3-year-old about how work leads to money. However, finding a bank that's sturdy enough for a three year old and her very curious year old brother has not been easy. This bank has fit the bill exactly. It's cute and she loves it. It's easy for both of them to carry around. It has been dropped, thrown, tossed, and kicked and still looks good as new. When we start introducing her brother to the concept of work leading to money I'm planning on buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Read and Review

customer_reviews.title: Happy Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very unsure about this purchase after reading reviews, but I am so happy that I went ahead. I was looking for a child's bank and there really isn't much out there. This turned out to be twice the size I expected and so cute with little neck scarf. I bought it for a two year old. Put some money in and gave some money to put in.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but more importantly, unbreakable.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter smashed 2 ceramic piggy banks so finding an unbreakable one was a must. This poor Piggy has been thrown once or twice and is, thankfully, no worse for wear. My only issue is that coins get stuck in his legs, which are hollow on the inside. In order to get change out of the bank you must shake and roll the thing over, then shake and roll some more. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Don't count on ever seeing your money again.
customer_reviews.text: This is a review for the rubber piggy bank. It's cute. Sturdy. But the legs are hollow and eat the change. It's really hard to get the money out of this bank. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: nova mama

customer_reviews.title: A Big Bank for Little Hands
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product -- great sculpt with robust construction which is critical when a toddler in involved. It is a "Big Bank for Little Hands" and makes a great gift, with a nice touch of whimsy, for the young saver. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Narukami

customer_reviews.title: Great piggy bank for younger child!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my destructive princess... lol. My daughter, 5, was begging me for a piggy bank to save the change she found. I wanted something sturdy, unbreakable, and safe for her and her mischievous ways. Once the bank arrived I was surprised at the large size, it’s bigger than you think, and supper girl cute. My daughter fell in love with the pig immediately and now has her first savings plan in action next to her bed.
customer_reviews.author: DERICK D.

customer_reviews.title: Cute piggy bank would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this piggy bank, it is super cute and my daughter loves it. Had to get one that would not break if thrown or dropped as little ones tend to do that often. Little one was so happy she carries it around with her, watch out for your change, and even sleeps with it. We are very happy and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Nice bank
customer_reviews.text: Nice bank. The only downside is that it may be difficult to remove coins if they go into the pig's legs. Additionally the slot is not big enough to fit silver dollars. Nice quality and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: James Edward

customer_reviews.title: Adorable piggy bank!!
customer_reviews.text: My 4yo asked for a piggy bank for Christmas and this one is awesome. It's perfect. It's durable and won't break easily, the piggy's head turns, which he loves, and the scarf is ADORABLE. So many piggy banks out there have cheap paint that chips easily, but you don't have to worry about that with this piggy bank. It's just so stinkin' cute, even my 4 boys think so.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get the money out
customer_reviews.text: This piggy bank looks great but has one huge flaw - it is super hard to get your money out of it. There’s a lip around the opening that prevents the coins from sliding out easily. As a result, I’ve had to turn the piggy bank on its side, position the coins near to the opening and then fish them out one by one. It’s a great piggy bank if your kid just wants to put coins in and forget about them, but if you’re looking for something with easy access, definitely get another product.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Driver

customer_reviews.title: Great kids piggy bank
customer_reviews.text: This bank is just what I was looking for. Gift for a four year old. Can be dropped and not break it is a soft rubber. Good size old fashioned piggy bank. Arrived perfect with no marks on it. Perfectly clean and boxed new.
customer_reviews.author: Lanijerr

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & classic
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't bought a piggy bank for my toddler because I feared it would break. So when I found this one I thought it was perfect and it is. You always see kids shaking their piggy banks in excitement and my son can do that without me fearing it could drop & break. It's also just very simple and classic. I gave it 4 stars because my 3 year old can twist the cap on the belly and take out the coins easily but we talk about what a piggy bank is for and we put the coins back.
customer_reviews.author: Soracco

customer_reviews.title: Once your money is inside this little piggy, it ...
customer_reviews.text: Once your money is inside this little piggy, it wants to keep it. There is a plug that allows you to retrieve your money but it will take patience.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Fiust

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this piggy bank for my 2 year old grandson to teach him about saving money. Now when I see him and bring change, he knows to get his piggy bank so he can put the change in it. Its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Bank On This Piggy
customer_reviews.text: Being an accountant, I usually give Piggy Banks (and starter fund) as a shower gift. This one is perfect as it's rubber and not breakable, with an opening perfect for little hands. You can also "customize" the scarf if you are giving to more than one child in a family.
customer_reviews.author: NYC73

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my 3 year old so she could learn to save money and she loves it. it is really cute and is made of a harder plastic/rubber material. My daughter carries it around with her like its a stuffed animal and plays with it like its a toy. well worth the money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Piggy Bank
customer_reviews.text: It's so great to find a piggy bank that is not breakable. This is really the only piggy bank of I have seen that is a decent size and not made of ceramic or glass. This piggy bank is a nice size and has survived a lot of drops and falls at our house with no issue. You will feel safe letting your child play with this piggy bank and carry it around. We have not had any trouble getting the money out - sometimes it does take a shake or to get the money over to the hole in the piggy bank but that is part of the charm of piggy banks.
customer_reviews.author: 47RTS

customer_reviews.title: I've Bought Bunches of These
customer_reviews.text: I buy this piggy bank frequently as a gift for nieces, nephews, and other little ones in my life. It's as cute as can be and soft enough to be huggable. One Christmas, I had 4 little girls running around my house cuddling the banks like baby dolls. I had to give them bath towels to use as baby blankets. My only tiny negative comment would be that the scarf only comes in one color/print. I wish they were available in a variety of colors so that children living in the same household could tell their bank's apart. Even if I wasn't allowed to make a specific color choice, a random variety would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Spenser Amadeus

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but coins get stuck inside legs and head
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute and sturdy plastic piggy bank. However, the one downside is that the legs and head are also hollow, so coins get trapped in them. Getting coins back out of the piggy bank is quite difficult!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Barron

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this bank is wonderful! Think plastic with a great feel to it. Its sturdy and well made. But what really gets me is the face on this bank is precious! My granddaughter got it for her Mama who is a pig fan...I'm not particularly but with this pig I'm beginning to be! So cute! Great size too! Not little!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Durable enough for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Searched hard for a non-ceramic piggy bank that would actually be durable enough for a 3 year old boy. This one fits the bill. He has dropped it, shaken it, it has even been scooted across the floor like it was a car. He has great finger dexterity, yet still cant get the bottom seal off. We did dislike the country kerchief, but it was a simple remove and replaced with a fabric more suited to our boys taste.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Great quality. Kids can play with it and use it to store money. Got one for my niece and I'll be getting another for my nephew. Can't find anything else that's similar!
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great bank for 6 year old. In previous reviews, I read kids would carry them around & become attached to them. The first day my Grandson had this bank, he removed the neck scarf & his bank became his pet pig. Due to reviews, I stuffed the legs with cotton immediately to prevent coins getting stuck. Other than that, the bank is very durable & well made.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful find for a child! Unbreakable
customer_reviews.text: My four-year-old granddaughter asked for a piggy bank and I was so happy to find this one to gift her. She carries it around the house with her and it holds up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Missing_Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Bought for our 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: He loves his "money bank". We're going to have to work out some simple chores for a 4 year old so he can earn some money to put in it. :) I especially love this one because it's rubber - anything else would break for sure in our household.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Tribby

customer_reviews.title: A real PIGGY bank!
customer_reviews.text: It is very hard to find an unbreakable piggy bank in stores. This is cute, durable, but a little bigger than I imagined. I've read reviews that stated the bottom plug was missing. Sure enough, the plug was not on. Then I looked around and it was in the box. So do look in the box before complaining. The company should tape that on.
customer_reviews.author: mary class

customer_reviews.title: Missing Plug & Had Scuffs
customer_reviews.text: Received this bank - very cute, sturdy and a great size. Seemingly indestructible! Although I could see some of the coins potentially getting stuck in the limbs. Also, mine came without a plug and it had some scuffs as another reviewer pointed out. Had to send it back - my 4 year old was crushed. Better quality control would be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzles66

customer_reviews.title: Just the ticket
customer_reviews.text: This little piggy stays at the grandparents house. After all, he needs to be fed. Super cute with a large capacity. I love that the kids can handle and play with them and I don’t have to worry. The only con is that it’s a bit pricy for a plastic piggy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Coins aren't easy to get out of it.
customer_reviews.text: It's really a cute piggy bank but it's really difficult to get coins out of it. They get stuck in legs. My grandchild removed its head to get money out and it put a permanent kink in the lip of the neck of the pigs head and now the head will not stay on. My only thought is to super glue it back on. I probably wouldn't buy another one for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Kids can play with it!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking piggy bank. Since it is rubber, the kids can play with it without fear of breaking it. Small complaint is that due to shape coins are difficult to get out. I think it is great overall and the kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Was love at first sight.....
customer_reviews.text: My 3yr old granddaughter is absolutely in love with her little piggy. She gives it kisses and talks to it all the time. Haha. . . . She carries it everywhere, even puts it in her little baby stroller. It's a plactic / rubber material so she can't break it or hurt herself if it's dropped . I also purchased the My pink piggy bank book that was recommended with it and am looking forward to story time with her new piggy of course. We're very happy with it.......nice quality and very cute appearance. You never know what little one's are going to take to so this was a pleasant surprise! Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hartnett

customer_reviews.title: Pig that basically steals your kid's money.
customer_reviews.text: Cute pig, but once the money is in, good luck getting it back out! I thought maybe the head needed to be removed to get the money out. But guess what? Nope. Once the head is off, you are stuck with a decapitated piggy and a crying toddler. Thanks Wilbur.
customer_reviews.author: grumpykitten

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy piggy bank
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new piggy bank and I love that she can’t break it. She’s brought it all over our house and it’s definitely sturdy. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Amie R

customer_reviews.title: Darling Piggy Bank!!
customer_reviews.text: I filled the bank with over $40 in quarters for a guessing game for children at a Fundraiser and the winner was very excited. The information states that the bank is made of rubber. It isn't soft like I thought it might be, but very sturdy and perfect for little ones. Much better choice for a child than a breakable bank. Very pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Greene

customer_reviews.title: That’s some pig!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old grandson was delighted with this pig. He loves carrying it about and putting pennies in the slot. It is quite substantial.
customer_reviews.author: DZ

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this piggy bank!
customer_reviews.text: This is just the CUTEST pig ever! I love that it's rubber, meaning it's seems to be made out of the same thing a Baby doll is made from so no worry about breaking it. The head turns and you can remove the scarf but I don't know why you would, LOVE this piggy bank!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Harmon

customer_reviews.title: What a great piggy bank
customer_reviews.text: Love, LOVE this piggy bank. It's a nice size. Started my 18 month old grandaughter out with this bank. So glad it's not breakable (some type of rubber). She gets so excited to put her money in the bank then kiss it goodnite till the next day. Teaching her early how to save and value money.
customer_reviews.author: snowberry

customer_reviews.title: I would have returned it but it was a Christmas gift to my four year old who was overjoyed in getting his piggy bank
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the product came with a long piece of black hair stuck in the bottom of the box and yellow stains on the ears and feet. I would have returned it but it was a Christmas gift to my four year old who was overjoyed in getting his piggy bank. I had to scrub with different products until the majority of the stain came off. If it wasn't for this bizarre circumstance the pig is a great purchase and nice size. This is not the first time that a product has been received from Amazon in less than prestine condition. I am becoming skeptical of making any future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old nephew likes to rummage for coins so I bought him this. It doubles as a toy. He loves to play with it and it’s sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: He is a good size, easy to get money out
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our children's ministry at church - the kids tithe. Such a fin way to teach about tithing. And, this little bank is really cute. He is a good size, easy to get money out, and I love his collar :)
customer_reviews.author: Justyn VdP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kids First Piggy Bank
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for 19 month old and 3 year old grandsons. They're really adorable, but not too cute, and the boys love their piggies! They use them as toys, so thank goodness they're durable. The bottom plug is twist on, so they don't easily pop off. The point is to keep the money IN the bank, so who really cares that there's a lip that make it a little more difficult to dump it all out at once, that's a really silly complaint. Very happy with the piggies.
customer_reviews.author: Drumlin

customer_reviews.title: Take it to the Bank
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a much smaller bank. I am thrilled. This piggy bank is perfect. It is a good size, pink as pink can be, well made and quite cute. Looks like it is here for the long haul. Will be buying more for my other grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Large and Unbreakable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bank for my three and a half year old grandson. The bank is large and un breakable vinyl. It's really great! Cute. And has an opening underneath to get out the money.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old received this as a Christmas present and she loves it. It's hard to find a good sized piggy bank that's not ceramic or won't break if it's dropped. This one is a very hard plastic. It's survived being dropped, flung, sat on and its very first tea party. My daughter did not like the blue neck scarf, but it was easily removed. There is an opening on the bottom to get the coins out that my daughter can open herself. I guess that could be considered a con depending on whether or not one would want one's child to be able to open the piggy bank.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the previous reviewers indicated that her grandson carried it around. My 2 year old grandson does the same. Soft, unbreakable and looks great. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It is true what other reviewers say about coins getting stuck in the legs. Other than that, I love this piggy bank
customer_reviews.author: Audry

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived clean, & came w a plug so I'm happy! Super cute! Doesn't bother me that the coins fall into the legs. I'm just happy to find such a cute bank that isn't glass for my 4 yr old to play w/. No strong smells from this piggy either (which I am always concerned about due to my sensitivity to chemicals).
customer_reviews.author: S. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great child's gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my granddaughter for her 4th birthday, and she loves it! It's unbreakable, and she has collected so much change in the last 3 months (robbing her parents' pockets when she can!) that she can't lift it anymore. But she loves to talk about it, and can't wait until she is allowed to open it and spend the money. A good gift that teaches children to save.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Toddler proof!, Very good piggy bank.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable piggy bank! My 3 year old son loves this. It's made to be child and most importantly toddler proof! Some reviews complain about getting the money out, but we encourage to keep the money in!!! It's a piggy bank people. Great product, a little pricey I think but great all the same
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Price is not that cheap, but it is a good piggy bank, you also can use it to decorate the house...
customer_reviews.author: Picky shopper

customer_reviews.title: I like that it's plastic and can't easily break as our ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for 3 of our kids. I like that it's plastic and can't easily break as our oldest son's previous piggy bank did (ceramic). We are going to remove the bandana on two of them and make them different color bandanas so they can tell them apart.
customer_reviews.author: Liana Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great first piggy bank
customer_reviews.text: Great simple piggy bank. My three year old loves it. Not worried about it breaking and it’s cute!
customer_reviews.author: AshleyN

customer_reviews.title: No bottom to the piggy bank
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. I recieved it without the bottom of the piggy bank. How am i supposed to put coins in the piggy bank they will fall straight through! And it had dirty marks all over it. So sad it didn’t come with a bottom, i am unable to use it now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made of hard plastic and not a soft flexible rubber as i had thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: First off let me say for the price this pig bank is 100% with it! It is so cute and I'm sure my 4 year old will love it come Christmas morning! The reason for 4 stars is I thought it would be a rubber bank as stated in the description, however it's more of a hard hard plastic. I was expecting it to be a little more flexible and easy to handle for a kid. Overall though it is nice and again super cute and I would get it again!
customer_reviews.author: nicole Mills

customer_reviews.title: Marks all over it straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The pig is strong and cute, but it came all marked up, and it’s ears have this weird coloring too. It looks used or poorly packaged/made.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Evans

customer_reviews.title: You will like this
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his piggy bank. It is sturdy but yet soft. He can drop it and I don’t have to worry about breaking it
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT LITTLE BANK
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT LITTLE PIGGY BANK FOR MY LITTLE GRANDDAUGHTER SHE LOVES ARNOLD. YES SHE NAMED IT ALREADY.. AND SHE HAS GOT IT HALF FILLED ALREADY. I GUESS ARNOLD WILL HAVE TO GET A FRIEND FOR THE REST OF HER MONEY..
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Easy to save!
customer_reviews.text: My Little saver wanted a piggy bank that is a real looking pig! After the first one made of ceramic we purchased met it's maker via tile floor after 1 day of being carried around. This was the perfect choice - It is sturdy and holds a lot of coins. We love to Feed the Pig!!!!! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Toddler bank
customer_reviews.text: Holds is shape well, but soft enough to give a toddler and let them play with it. Without worry about them, or the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Tucker

customer_reviews.title: This little piggy is cute
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased to fill with coins for Christmas, they ate cute and held about $100.00 in mixed coins
customer_reviews.author: J Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great educational tool for children. So cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: So very cute. Perfect gift for my 3 year old grandson. He loves it and spends so much time finding change to put in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bank, if the plug is included
customer_reviews.text: Super cute little piggy bank - my daughter loves playing with it and putting money in it. But... it's supposed to come with a plug, and ours was missing. Pretty annoying since that's basically what makes it a piggy bank. If there was a plug I'd give it 5 stars; as is I'm giving it 3 due to the extra trouble of having to get a plug. I'm. Hoping to contact the manufacturer and will update this review afterward.
customer_reviews.author: ras

customer_reviews.title: you can store a good amount of money inside
customer_reviews.text: It's kinda big. Well, you can store a good amount of money inside. I became use to the small piggy bank we had before. And this guy seems like that old ones brawny Papa to large. The piggy is good quality and the head moves..
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa B. Ross

customer_reviews.title: It's simply ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year old daughter. The only thing that I really love is that it is plastic and not ceramic like most banks are. It is cute but I have the same complaints as the other reviewers: Hard to get money out due to it either falling in the legs or getting stuck on the inner lip and mine also came with green and brown smudges all over it. I was able to clean some of them but unfortunately not all of them. My daughter will keep her money in it so it is technically doing it's job but it is not a "must have" piggy bank, unless your top priority is durability.
customer_reviews.author: K. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piggy bank
customer_reviews.text: This was the piggy that we have been looking for! I was nervous looking at ceramic piggy banks for my 3 yo and this was the ONLY one that was a rubber/plastic piggy bank and it looks so real! Our kid loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Greg B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for little hands!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this! Very durable (it’s been thrown down the stairs and remained intact) and easy for little hands to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Fink

customer_reviews.title: More a toy than a piggy bank
customer_reviews.text: I see that most people here bought this for small children... Well, I bought this for myself, intended to be not as a toy but as a piggy bank, as as alternative for just dropping coins on the kitchen counter when we come from the street. I imagined that this would be a small piggy bank, cute but discreet - but no, it's HUGE, I cannot leave that in my kitchen or living room, so I'm returning it. (Which is my fault, as I failed to read the dimensions.) However, it's a great gift for children - extremely cute, soft and cuddly. A friend I'd love to have if I were little.
customer_reviews.author: Sev's Favorite Potions Girl

customer_reviews.title: Really cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is larger than I thought it would be - it is a nice size! Purchased as a gift for our grandson. He is so excited to have his own bank and since it isn't ceramic, he can't break it!
customer_reviews.author: Grammie to10

customer_reviews.title: The Best piggy bank!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best most durable piggy bank you will find for the money anywhere! The kids (and even adults) loved the realistic design of the pig and how durable it is
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little piggy bank. No weird plastic smells, which is great. Our daughter absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Morey

customer_reviews.title: Cute rubber piggy bank.
customer_reviews.text: Love it she's so happy she love it it's right size and rubber other she has it smaller then this
customer_reviews.author: sofe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Like the size, sturdiness, thickness and durability. Great for a child teaching to save money.
customer_reviews.author: Carroll J. Schuety

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Did not have the weird smell I've seen other reviewers complain of. Won't break and leave nasty sharp glassy shards all over your floor. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jim Salter

customer_reviews.title: SO cute!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grandson's 3rd birthday. I wanted something he could carry around and wouldn't break on him. First of all, this piggy bank is the most adorable thing I've ever seen. I knew it looked cute in the picture, but it's even cuter in person. Secondly it's much larger than I expected, so it will hold a lot of money. He's very excited about having coins and dollars so teaching him to save it in this piggy bank will be great. This is a must for anyone looking for a cute, durable piggy bank the little ones can have.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: A big nope
customer_reviews.text: Tried to pull out the plug and it broke Can’t use it now
customer_reviews.author: tacomarealtor

customer_reviews.title: Bought with money book
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the grands with books on saving money. Never to early to start them saving.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jackson

customer_reviews.title: This is sturdy and adorable !
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grand daughter, she Loooves this little cutie! She fills him with coins and plays with him too! It’s full enough now that the coins are going into his head ! Shipped out in a timely mannner . It’s also made of a very sturdy material!
customer_reviews.author: dee m

customer_reviews.title: It won’t shatter in the hands of a 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Had a porcelain one and my toddler slammed it down. Obviously it broke, but thankfully it did not shatter or cause injustice. So, I went searching for something that wouldn’t break. Came across this and couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old got this for Christmas and he was delighted. So far, it's holding up well and he hasn't noticed that he can take the money out. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Angela R

customer_reviews.title: Barnyard pig
customer_reviews.text: These is a pig you need if you don't want glass or acrylic
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get coins out
customer_reviews.text: It looks very nice, but coins get stuck in the legs and head, so it's not easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Thysell

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute little piggy bank! I gave it to my little cousin for her first birthday. It went over really well with her mom. Nice and sturdy so if she gets ahold of it, it wont shatter!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my six year old. Not breakable. Removable bottom. Pretty cute in a weird way.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jones

customer_reviews.title: So many smiles
customer_reviews.text: Really cute. It’s a hard plastic with a soft texture. My child loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: we don't do that very often so it is fine.
customer_reviews.text: After breaking her little beloved purple piggy bank my 3.5 year old daughter was heartbroken so, I searched all over for something she couldn't break and found this. SHE LOVES IT. We supervise her with change, even though she has never given us a reason to think she would put it in her mouth. But, she loves to sit with us and add money to it or take the money out and count it. The money is very hard to get out but, we don't do that very often so it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Better than a breakable piggy bank
customer_reviews.text: After my 2 year old dropped (i.e. exploded) his last piggy bank when it had just a little too much coin in it, we replaced it with this one. He loves it and it has been dropped enough times that we're satisfied with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vargason

customer_reviews.title: Durable piggy is great for deposits
customer_reviews.text: This little piggy is great for my almost-3-year old grandson. He’s learning coin values and has started saving a portion of his allowance that he gets for doing his chores. He enjoys putting his money in the pig and piggy has a very satisfying jingle with just a little money inside! The bank is durable and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable....
customer_reviews.text: I iron-on my grandchildren's names so they could tell them apart - they turned out so cute!!! Pictures do not show how adorable they really are.
customer_reviews.author: jrup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size -non breakable bank
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my grandson and when i could not find a different one i liked for my grand daughter i bought another one for her. I had to change the scarf though. It only came in blue.
customer_reviews.author: a.c

customer_reviews.title: Cute bank, very durable
customer_reviews.text: Very Cute bank, my 2.5yr old loves it, she makes it "Oink". Only complaint is as others have said, when you want to empty it (we take the money to the actual bank when its full), its a bit tricky to get all the coins out as they get stuck in the legs. Once you shake out most of the coins, I have small enough hands that i can scoop out the last 2-3 coins though.
customer_reviews.author: Andromache

customer_reviews.title: Super cute good sized bank
customer_reviews.text: Super cute good sized bank, very durable and perfect for my young granddaughter who kept dropping her ceramic piggy banks. There were copious tears over the shattered banks. The head turns so you can face it in any direction. She has already dropped the bank several time and it has survived without even a scratch. Well constructed and a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy's Mom

product_meta.title: Schylling Rubber Piggy Bank
product_meta.description:
Color:PinkEveryone remembers their old piggy bank. This is a true piggy bank. It is pink with a slot in his back. It is made of vinyl, and has a movable head. Also includes blue gingham scarf. It measures 7.50” across.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Everyone remembers their old piggy bank. This is a true piggy bank. It is pink with a slot in his back. It is made of vinyl, and has a movable head. Also includes blue gingham scarf. It measures 7.50” across.
feature_bullets: Pink vinyl pig with slot in his back.
A fun way to save your money.
